(Simplified: 鲩)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 完 indicates the sound; 魚 (fish) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 魚 [ yú ] fish
    • 完 [ wán ] to complete, to finish, to settle; whole
①(鯇魚)體筒形，生活在淡水中，是中國特產的重要魚類之一。亦稱“草魚”。

鯇字的基本解释

鯇
huàn
见“鲩”。

鯇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huàn］
［《廣韻》户板切，上潸，匣。］
亦作“鰀1”。“鲩1”的繁体字。
鱼名。即草鱼。体略呈圆筒形，青黄色。生活于淡水。是我国主要的养殖鱼之一。

鯇字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鯇； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1471第13
【廣韻】【集韻】?戸板切，音睅。【說文】魚名。【爾雅·釋魚】鯇。【註】今鯶魚，似鱒而大。○按《爾雅》鱧、鯇二字?列，非以鯇訓鱧也。疏云：鱧一名鯇，非。又《本草》：鯇似鯉，生江湖閒，膽至苦，主喉閉。《類篇》亦作鯶鰀。又【廣韻】胡本切【集韻】胡袞切，?音混。又【集韻】戸管切，音浣。又胡玩切，音換。義?同。

Carp
Basic explanation of words
Carp
huàn
See "Scarp".
Carp
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huàn］
["Guangyun" household board cut, Shanglu, box. ]
Also known as "鰀1". "鲩1" in traditional characters.
The name of the fish. That is, grass carp. The body is slightly cylindrical and bluish-yellow. Lives in fresh water. It is one of the main farmed fish in our country.
Carp
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鲩; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1471 13
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? 戸板切，音睅。 [Said the text] The name of the fish. 【Erya·Shiyu】Squash. [Note] Today's catfish is as big as a trout. ○According to "Erya", the two characters for Channa and Channa are not used to train Channa. Shuyun: a snakehead snakehead, non. Also "Materia Medica": Carp like carp, live in rivers and lakes, courage to bitterness, main throat closed. "Classification" is also used as 鯶鰀. Also [Guangyun] Hu Benqie [Jiyun] Hu Dunqie, sound mixing. Also 【Jiyun】Tunguan cut, sound huan. Play and cut again, and change the sound. Righteous? Same.
